meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 1. rate; ratio; proportion
2. one tenth; ten percent usu. 割トムは勤務終了時間を超えて働くと、５割アップの時給をもらっていた。Tom got time and a half when he worked beyond his usual quitting time.
3. (comparative) profit; gain See also 割に合う, usu. 割り私は割のいい仕事の申し入れを受けた。I received a good job offer.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 4. assignment; allotment; allocation usu. 割り
5. match; schedule of matches Sumo, usu. 割り

6. diluted with (of drinks); mixed with See also 水割り, usu. 割り休みの前などは少し羽目を外して飲むのだが、杜仲茶割りで飲むと二日酔いが全くない。I usually cut loose a bit and drink plenty before a day off work, but if my drinks are cut with tochu tea, then I get absolutely no hangover.
7. discount; rebate Abbreviation, See also 割引き, usu. 割
8. Wari
割 【わり】

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 1. rate; ratio; proportion
2. one tenth; ten percent usu. 割トムは勤務終了時間を超えて働くと、５割アップの時給をもらっていた。Tom got time and a half when he worked beyond his usual quitting time.
3. (comparative) profit; gain See also 割に合う, usu. 割り私は割のいい仕事の申し入れを受けた。I received a good job offer.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a suffix
meanings.meaning: 4. assignment; allotment; allocation usu. 割り
5. match; schedule of matches Sumo, usu. 割り

6. diluted with (of drinks); mixed with See also 水割り, usu. 割り休みの前などは少し羽目を外して飲むのだが、杜仲茶割りで飲むと二日酔いが全くない。I usually cut loose a bit and drink plenty before a day off work, but if my drinks are cut with tochu tea, then I get absolutely no hangover.
7. discount; rebate Abbreviation, See also 割引き, usu. 割
8. Wari
割 【わり】

sentences.translation: Tom got time and a half when he worked beyond his usual quitting time.
I received a good job offer.
I usually cut loose a bit and drink plenty before a day off work, but if my drinks are cut with tochu tea, then I get absolutely no hangover.

meanings.meaning: 1. rate; ratio; percentage; proportion クラスの女生徒の男生徒に対する割合は３対２だ。The proportion of girls to boys in our class is three to two.
2. comparatively
3. contrary to expectations
割り合い 【わりあい】
割り合い: Irregular okurigana usage.

meanings.meaning: 1. to break; to be smashed
2. to split; to crack; to fissure; to be torn
3. to be divided (opinion, vote, etc.); to split (e.g. of a party)
4. to come to light; to become clear; to be identified; to be revealed
5. to become distorted (of sound); to clip
6. to be divisible (without a remainder)
7. to drop below a minimum
破れる 【われる】
